dr.evomodel.speciation
Class MultiSpeciesCoalescent

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.Likelihood.Abstract
      dr.evomodel.speciation.MultiSpeciesCoalescent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Units, Loggable, Likelihood, ModelListener, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class MultiSpeciesCoalescent
extends Likelihood.Abstract
implements Units

Compute coalecent log-liklihood of a set of gene trees embedded inside one species tree.

Author:
Joseph Heled Date: 26/05/2008

Description copied from interface: ModelListener
